content.prompt: The decision guaranteeing the rights of Mexican Americans to serve on juries most directly resulted from which of the following historical processes during this period?

choices.label: The utilization of strikes to demand increased compensation
The effort to identify suspected communists in the federal government
The expansion of social welfare programs by the federal government
The use of court challenges to obtain legal reforms

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
